DOC.brief_summary: This phase 1 , open label , two-cohort , single-sequence , crossover study
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Safety Telmisartan/Amlodipine Rosuvastatin
DOC.detailed_description: This phase 1 , open label , two-cohort , single-sequence , crossover study investigate pharmacokinetic drug interaction safety Telmisartan/Amlodipine Rosuvastatin healthy male volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 28 kg/m2 Who suffer clinically significant disease Provision sign write informed consent History clinically significant disease A history drug abuse presence positive reaction drug abuse potential urine screening drug Administration investigational product within 3 month prior first dose Volunteers consider eligible clinical trial investigator due reason include laboratory test result , ECGs , vital sign Sitting blood pressure meeting follow criterion screen : 160 ≥ systolic blood pressure ≤100 ( mmHg ) 95 ≥ diastolic blood pressure ≤ 60 ( mmHg )
